Articles.Content:
Well I had been playing with BdAc for quite sometime and I thought if we could spawn military vehicles with their engines on ,we could simply have a military campaign. So can anyone help me here?

PS. Don't be rude like steam. I've been an explorer for a 2yr now n now I wish military expeditions.
Lot's of people do BDA competitions and such, go search one up and join in!
